Object Parameters: ID, used in begoman_manager to control when they appear
Time from the start of the race until the topman will switch from the 1st ring to the 2nd ring.
Time from the start of the race until the topman will switch from the 2nd ring to the 3rd ring.
Time from the start of the race until the topman will switch from the 3rd ring to the 4th ring.
Description:
Topman from Galaxy Colosseum; object not used in any track. To appear, it (or they) must be the first object of section [[KMP#GOBJ|GOBJ]]. They appear to not obey [[KCL flag#Wall (0x0C)|wall collision]]. Note that the rings are hardcoded to have their centre at (0,0).
Only works on slots 3.1, 4.2, 6.2, 7.1, and Galaxy Colosseum.
